column1: Q: Why does USSR stands for United Soviet Socialist Republics? A: Because the country is neither united, nor soviet, nor socialist, nor republics.
Q: Why is Soviet chocolate the best? A: Because after you eat it, for a long time you don't want any more.
Q: Does the USSR have a satisfactory standard of living? A: Oh yes, on any standard you like, as long as it's not living.
Q: What is the difference between USSR and a desert? A: In the desert, you can die of thirst, in USSR of talk about the advantages of socialism.
Q: Why does our government allow travelling abroad now? A: To save on winter coats.
